channel.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
channel.description:
Hey everyone :D
I remixed ["Lucid Dream" by Owl City](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMaLi0xsEWY) and entered it in Owl City's Cinematic remix contest. I'm especially proud of this one because I did all the vocal work and everything completely in Auxy :O While he does choose the winners manually, it's a lot more likely to win if you guys vote on it, so I really reeeally need your help!
To vote, you just need to like the track on Skio (click the voting link below). The only issue is, you need to have an account; you can get one if you want by signing in with SoundCloud and verifying your email.
Obviously you don't have to vote, but if you did I would really appreciate it. Thanks! :heart:
--
Voting link: https://skiomusic.com/stereofield/owl-city-lucid-dream-stereofield-remix Listen on SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/chipthrasher/luciddream Remix contest: https://skiomusic.com/contest/lucid-dream-remix-contest

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)

item.description:
Great work man! @stereofield

Matthew Parker’s entry is really good though

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
iammane:

If you like Owl City, do yourself a big 1-UP and check out The Postal Service.

Ah. I don’t actually like his music very much, but a friend recommended I enter the contest, so I decided to use remixing it as an opportunity to experiment with ways to handle vocals in Auxy.

I’ll check out TPS though

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
eohr:

if this was the original lucid dream i would be at least mostly pleased with him.

Haha I guess this is a complement?

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
If you like Owl City, do yourself a big 1-UP and check out The Postal Service. They’re not together anymore, it was the dream team of Jimmy Tamborello (DNTEL/Figurine) and Ben Gibbard (Death Cab For Cutie). Arguably one of the best electronic duo’s I’ve heard from 2000-2010, maybe since 2000.

There is ZERO doubt in my mind Owl City is very heavily inspired by The Postal Service, which isn’t a bad thing, but you really cannot beat the original.

Sorry for derailing a little bit. I mean it’s indirectly related.

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: eohr
item.description:
He used to be one of my favorites but god i really despise most of cinematic and if this was the original lucid dream i would be at least mostly pleased with him.

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
Yeah. Going over the limit wasn’t a problem for me since you don’t have to work as hard on the production when there are vocals, so I didn’t use as many instruments.

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Oh man, ouch. Well hey, it turned out great and you’ve got some serious patience. You used 5 channels just for vocals then right? I mean I guess that still leaves quite a bit of breathing room, max 20 instruments? I’ve never come close to whatever the max is so I’m unsure haha

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: stereofield
item.description:
iammane:

This must HAVE BEEN A NIGHTMARE to do all the vocals in Auxy, hats off to you on having the patience to chop them all up into sub 10 second samples, barf.

Haha there were about 36 vocal samples. Looking back, it probably was pretty hard but I didn’t think of that because I was happy that the new WAV samples for some reason FINALLY loaded into my Auxy library.

…

Turns out they were originally MP3s, not WAVs. I realized that after about a week

Read full topic

item.title: Owl City - Lucid Dream (Stereofield Remix)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Really well done. I’m gonna have to pull up the original haven’t heard Owl City in some time.

This must HAVE BEEN A NIGHTMARE to do all the vocals in Auxy, hats off to you on having the patience to chop them all up into sub 10 second samples, barf.

I voted too. Best of luck man

Read full topic

Hey everyone

I remixed “Lucid Dream” by Owl City and entered it in Owl City’s Cinematic remix contest. I’m especially proud of this one because I did all the vocal work and everything completely in Auxy While he does choose the winners manually, it’s a lot more likely to win if you guys vote on it, so I really reeeally need your help!
